row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
row.description: Build Java arguments common for all services.

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_ACTION_SPECIFIC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Load package parameters :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS
! Add read timeout, connection timeout and x-ms-version to java arguments : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "-readtimeout") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "&UC4RB_AZR_READ_TIMEOUT#")
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "-connectiontimeout") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "&UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#")
